Dr. Pol is called out to two calvings, Dr. Lisa skillfully stitches a Chihuahua after a dog fight, Dr. Brenda gives special attention to a calf needing extra nutrients, and Dr. Nicole gives a duck a pedicure. With one call right after the other, the team‚Äôs day is just as wild as the Michigan weather.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: An ice storm shuts down the clinic and newborn labs are melting hearts. When treacherous weather leaves injured animals in its wake, Dr. Pol and his team slide in to fix busted hips and toe tips. Dr. Lisa handles a demanding delivery while Dr. Brenda impresses by corralling cattle and wrangling racehorses.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: She leads the formidable Sausage Tree Pride, an ensemble of buffalo-slaying huntresses. That is, until the migration crosses their prime domain and they demonstrate ultimate adaptability and switch prey species. But the pride has been compromised after a split-away group left their ranks and now she must muster her troupe to excel at motherhood while male coalitions complicate dynamics all around them.

programme.title: Land Of The Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: After losing his mother and sister at one year old, he taught himself to hunt, but now has to deal with his other thieving relatives. He's survived this long in spite of difficulty, and knocks down all stereotypes as he is not only social, but family oriented. .

programme.title: Africa's Deadly Kingdom
programme.desc: South Africa's West Coast. An unforgiving, volatile world pummelled by icy Atlantic waters and buffeted by howling winds. .

programme.title: Africa's Deadly Kingdom
programme.desc: Africa's Deadly Kingdom: Reefs dives in to reveal the astounding adaptations of a multitude of marine creatures to life below the waves.
